title: 12/08/20 HOUR 2- Steve Palazzolo and Mac Jones
itunes:title: 12/08/20 HOUR 2- Steve Palazzolo and Mac Jones
description:
Steve Palazzolo tells Dan that he gives credit to Carr for completing the pass against the Jets. Steve says the blitz call is not that egregious. Mac Jones tells Dan how he became Mac instead of Michael.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
